category.title: Wind Damage
category.description: Wind has affected something in the area.  Examples trees down, telephone pole knocked over, power lines down.

category.title: River/ Stream Flooding
category.description: This means that part of the river or stream has flooded, ex. water over a road. Not for reporting water in a house

category.title: Water Damage
category.description: Water has affected a residence.  Example water is up against the foundation of the house, or water is now in the basement.

category.title: Other Event
category.description: Anything that is not covered in the other categories can be placed here
